text:
@maddow Bet 1: @realDonaldTrump claims a victory lap bc the US #Covid19 death toll will be less than 1/4 million by Nov 3 (though it will pass that mark by inauguration day).

Bet 2: An alarmingly large nbr of voters will accept mass deaths as a fair price to pay for #Trump reelection.
